random.line: I'm out here doing research for a game I'm developing. It's going to be a Metriodvania style in an open world.
Yeah. The only problem is time. Games take forever to make. Like over two years for your average game.
Well, I like RPG games. If I had to pick, I'd pick the first Professor Layton game, as it blends puzzles and story perfectly.
Good choice. I personally love Final Fantasy 6.
